column4: I have 2 NICs and 2 IPs (eth0=10.0.x.x & wlan0=192.168.x.x).  Is it possible to specify that firefox uses eth0 and another application uses wlan0?
depends on the application. Most apps take --interface or -I to specify the interface to run on.
